name: Alchemy and Cake
description:
Content Warning:

Some implied Sexual Content and Drug Use. 

----

It's another busy day as a Monster Alchemist near The Orc City.  You're busy making potions, having hot dreams, and consoling your anxiety-ridden giant cat friend.

But when Adventurers show up to eradicate "all monsters", things start to go awry.

"Alchemy and Cake" is a Satirical Fantasy Game-themed comedy about a couple monsters facing off against the "Heroic Adventurers" of the Elven and Human persuasion.  

But also, it's about Potion Making, Conjuring Demons, Sad Cat Boys, Hot Orcs, and Cake.

This was done in 2.5 weeks for NanoReno 2022, I hope you enjoy this absolute adventure.

CAN YOU GET ALL THE SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS?

Hints text file is located in the download section.

----

Known Bugs:

-Some text has shown to be clipped at the bottom.  I apologize for this and will see if I can fix this in a future release.

-Are you having trouble playing the Browser version on your ipad?  Safari apparently has problems with fullscreen mode, however, Chrome works fine.

-There will be some writing edits, particularly with punctuation, grammar... etc, in a future release.
